info.description: What We Do section with highlighted text

Description.default: We manufacture premium doors, panels and furniture using revolutionary honeycomb technology. Every product is crafted from 100% recycled materials - stronger than wood, lighter weight, and completely sustainable.

SecondaryDescription.default: The Make furniture stronger than wood without cutting trees. We did it: 500+ projects prove recycled paper creates stronger materials. Our mission: Make wood obsolete.

TeritaryDescription.default: The Make furniture stronger than wood without cutting trees. We did it: 500+ projects prove recycled paper creates stronger materials. Our mission: Make wood obsolete.
